remarks: Any subgroup is a normal subgroup of its normalizer.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jan-2015.)
statement:
elnmz.1 $e |- N = { x e. X | A. y e. X ( ( x .+ y ) e. S <-> ( y .+ x ) e. S ) } $.
nmzsubg.2 $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
nmzsubg.3 $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
nmznsg.4 $e |- H = ( G |`s N ) $.
nmznsg $p |- ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> S e. ( NrmSGrp ` H ) ) $.
$d .+ x y $.
$d G x y $.
$d S x y $.
$d X x y $.
